member.summary: Company Identifier.

member.name: P:Erp.Tablesets.APInvHedListRow.OpenPayable
member.summary: Indicates if this is an "open" Payable.

member.name: P:Erp.Tablesets.APInvHedListRow.VendorNum
member.summary: The Internal VendorNum that ties back to the Vendor master file. This field is not directly maintainable, instead it is assigned from the Vendor.VendorNum using VendorID to find the Vendor record.

member.name: P:Erp.Tablesets.APInvHedListRow.InvoiceNum
member.summary: Vendor's invoice number.

member.name: P:Erp.Tablesets.APInvHedListRow.DebitMemo
member.summary: Indicates the type of document. Yes = Debit Memo, No= Invoice. This value can't be changed after the record has been created. Debit memos affect the way detail quantities and amounts are stored in the database. They will always be stored with a negative sign, but are entered as a positive. The system uses this field to test for Debit Memos, indicated by "DM" following the invoice number.

member.name: P:Erp.Tablesets.APInvHedListRow.InvoiceDate
member.summary: Invoice date.

member.name: P:Erp.Tablesets.APInvHedListRow.TaxAmt
member.summary: Total sales tax amount for this invoice. Totals the TaxAmt from the APInvTax records of this invoice.

member.name: P:Erp.Tablesets.APInvHedListRow.DueDate
member.summary: The due date of the earliest unpaid scheduled payment amount. Normally invoices only have a single due date and amount. However we provide for installment payments which have multiple due dates and associated amounts. When invoices are first created this date will always be equal to the first entry in the DateDueList. Then as transactions are applied this "Current" Due Date is refreshed by figuring out which is the earliest unpaid scheduled payment.

member.name: P:Erp.Tablesets.APInvHedListRow.GroupID
member.summary: The Group that the invoice was associated with during the data entry process. This field is not directly maintainable, it is assigned by the invoice entry program using the GroupID of the "current" group that the user is working with. It is used as a selection criteria during the posting process.

member.name: P:Erp.Tablesets.APInvHedListRow.Posted
member.summary: Indicates if this invoice has been Posted to the open payables file. Only invoices that have been Posted (true) will be included as part of the open payables, that is they will not appear on reports or inquiries other than those used within invoice entry. Otherwise they are considered as still being in data entry. This field is always "no" when the invoice is created. It is set to "yes" by the "Post function". Once an invoice is posted it can't be maintained via data entry.

member.name: P:Erp.Tablesets.APInvHedListRow.FiscalYear
member.summary: Fiscal Year is duplicated from the related APInvGrp. This is also refreshed if the InvoiceDate is changed.

member.name: P:Erp.Tablesets.APInvHedListRow.FiscalPeriod
member.summary: Fiscal period of invoice. This is duplicated in from the APInvGrp or when the invoice date is changed. It is overridable.

member.name: P:Erp.Tablesets.APInvHedListRow.InvoiceRef
member.summary: This field is maintainable/viewable only for Debit Memos. It represents the invoice # that this debit memo relates to. It can be left blank. If entered it must be a valid APInvHed record where the InvcHead.DebitMemo = No. This field is also used to order the invoices when printing aging reports. The idea is to be able to print the debit memos next to their corresponding invoice. Therefore, this field will always have a value. For Invoices it is equal to the InvoiceNum. For Debit memos where they are not related to an invoice it is also set equal to the Debit memo's InvoiceNum. In this later case when InvcHead.DebitMemo = Yes and InvcHead.InvoiceNum = InvcHead.InvoiceRef the InvoiceRef is reset to zero before being displayed, then when written back to the database it is set = to the InvoiceNum if the user did not enter a related invoice.

member.name: P:Erp.Tablesets.APInvHedListRow.InvoiceAmt
member.summary: Total invoice Amount. This field is an accumulation of the extended net amounts of the detail line items (APInvDtl) and of the miscellaneous charges/credits (APInvMsc) records. This field has a true sign. (debit memos are negative).

member.name: P:Erp.Tablesets.APInvHedListRow.InvoiceHeld
member.summary: Invoices that are within a data entry group can be put on "Hold". They will not be posted until InvoiceHeld=No. This flag can be used for whatever the reason the user may wish to keep an invoice in a data entry group from being posted. This is NOT the same thing as putting an invoice on PaymentHold.

member.name: P:Erp.Tablesets.APInvHedListRow.PayHold
member.summary: Indicates if this invoice should be held from having any further payments made against it. If "yes" then invoice can't be selected in check processing.

member.name: P:Erp.Tablesets.APInvHedListRow.Description
member.summary: A short description that can be used to explain what this invoice is for. Ex: Rent, Auto Lease Payment. This description is defaulted into the APTran.Description field when payments are made against the invoice.

member.name: P:Erp.Tablesets.APInvHedListRow.CurrencyCode
member.summary: A unique code that identifies the currency.

member.name: P:Erp.Tablesets.APInvHedListRow.LegalNumber
member.summary: The Legal Number for the record. This number is created based on setup parameters in table LegalNumber.

member.name: P:Erp.Tablesets.APInvHedListRow.CPay
member.summary: Flag to indicate if the invoice should be paid at the Central Payment Parent Company. Used in Centralized Payment process.

member.name: P:Erp.Tablesets.APInvHedListRow.CPayInvoiceBal
member.summary: Current outstanding balance of the corresponding invoice created at the Central Payment Parent Company. Carries a true sign. (Credit memos are negative).

member.name: P:Erp.Tablesets.APInvHedListRow.CPayDocInvoiceBal
member.summary: Current outstanding balance of the corresponding invoice created at the Central Payment Parent Company (Vendors currency). Carries a true sign. (Credit memos are negative).

member.name: P:Erp.Tablesets.APInvHedListRow.ApplyDate
member.summary: The date this invoice will get applied to the books when it is posted.

member.summary: Fiscal Year Suffix is duplicated from the related APInvGrp. This is also refreshed if the ApplyDate is changed.

member.summary: The fiscal calendar year/suffix/period were derived from.

member.summary: Indicates the type of document. Yes = Debit Memo, No= Invoice. This value can't be changed after the record has been created. Debit memos affect the way detail quantities and amounts are stored in the database. They will always be stored with a negative sign, but are entered as a positive. member.name: P:Erp.Tablesets.APInvHedRow.InvoiceDate

member.name: P:Erp.Tablesets.APInvHedRow.TermsCode
member.summary: Contains the foreign key to the PurTerms master file. Defaulted from Vendor.TermsCode. This is MANDATORY ENTRY. User maintainable via a combo-box for terms description.

member.name: P:Erp.Tablesets.APInvHedRow.TaxAmt
member.summary: Total sales tax amount for this invoice. Totals the TaxAmt from the APInvTax records of this invoice.

member.name: P:Erp.Tablesets.APInvHedRow.DocTaxAmt
member.summary: Total sales tax amount for this invoice. Totals the DocTaxAmt from the APInvTax records of this invoice.

member.name: P:Erp.Tablesets.APInvHedRow.DiscountDate
member.summary: Prompt payment discount due date. The date according to the terms when you are allowed to take the prompt payment discount (if any) given by the vendor. This date is NOT directly maintainable. It is calculated using the InvoiceDate + PurTerms.DiscountDays. If DebitMemo = Yes or PurTerms.NumberOfPayments > 1 then this is not applicable and is set to ? (null value).

member.name: P:Erp.Tablesets.APInvHedRow.DiscountAmt
member.summary: Discount amount that can be taken if paid by the DiscountDate. This is calculated by the System via APInvHed write trigger. Formula ((PurTerms.DiscountPercent/100)*APInvHed.InvoiceBal on AIn. If DebitMemo = Yes or PurTerms.NumberOfPayments > 1 then it is not applicable and is set to zero.

member.name: P:Erp.Tablesets.APInvHedRow.DocDiscountAmt
member.summary: Discount amount(Vendors Currency) that can be taken if paid by the DiscountDate. This is calculated by the System via APInvHed write trigger. Formula ((PurTerms.DiscountPercent/100)*APInvHed.InvoiceBal on AIn. If DebitMemo = Yes or PurTerms.NumberOfPayments > 1 then it is not applicable and is set to zero.

member.name: P:Erp.Tablesets.APInvHedRow.DueDate
member.summary: The due date of the earliest unpaid scheduled payment amount. Normally invoices only have a single due date and amount. However we provide for installment payments which have multiple due dates and associated amounts. When invoices are first created this date will always be equal to the first entry in the DateDueList. Then as transactions are applied this "Current" Due Date is refreshed by figuring out which is the earliest unpaid scheduled payment.

member.name: P:Erp.Tablesets.APInvHedRow.PayDates
member.summary: Contains the "list" of due dates for the scheduled payments. Delimited by the character defined in the "List-Delim" variable.

member.name: P:Erp.Tablesets.APInvHedRow.PayAmounts
member.summary: The scheduled payment amounts. Corresponds with the PayDates list. Delimited by the character defined in the "list-delim" variable.

member.name: P:Erp.Tablesets.APInvHedRow.DocPayAmounts
member.summary: The scheduled payment amounts.(Vendors Currency) Corresponds with the PayDates list. Delimited by the character defined in the "list-delim" variable.

member.name: P:Erp.Tablesets.APInvHedRow.StartUp
member.summary: An internal flag to indicate if this invoice was created by the Open Invoice Load program. These records are not maintainable/viewable via invoice entry.

member.name: P:Erp.Tablesets.APInvHedRow.InvoiceRef
member.summary: This field is maintainable/viewable only for Debit Memos. It represents the invoice # that this debit memo relates to. It can be left blank. If entered it must be a valid APInvHed record where the InvcHead.DebitMemo = No. This field is also used to order the invoices when printing aging reports. The idea is to be able to print the debit memos next to their corresponding invoice. Therefore, this field will always have a value. For Invoices it is equal to the InvoiceNum. For Debit memos where they are not related to an invoice it is also set equal to the Debit memo's InvoiceNum. In this later case when InvcHead.DebitMemo = Yes and InvcHead.InvoiceNum = InvcHead.InvoiceRef the InvoiceRef is reset to zero before being displayed, then when written back to the database it is set = to the InvoiceNum if the user did not enter a related invoice.

member.name: P:Erp.Tablesets.APInvHedRow.EntryPerson
member.summary: User ID that entered the invoice. This is not maintainable by the user.

member.name: P:Erp.Tablesets.APInvHedRow.InvoiceComment
member.summary: Used to establish invoice comments about the overall invoice.

member.name: P:Erp.Tablesets.APInvHedRow.InvoiceAmt
member.summary: Total invoice Amount. This field is an accumulation of the extended net amounts of the detail line items (APInvDtl) and of the miscellaneous charges/credits (APInvMsc) records. This field has a true sign. (debit memos are negative).

member.name: P:Erp.Tablesets.APInvHedRow.DocInvoiceAmt
member.summary: Total invoice Amount.(Vendors Currency) This field is an accumulation of the extended net amounts of the detail line items (APInvDtl) and of the miscellaneous charges/credits (APInvMsc) records. This field has a true sign. (debit memos are negative).

member.name: P:Erp.Tablesets.APInvHedRow.DocInvoiceVendorAmt
member.summary: A user entered verification amount. DOCUMENT CURRENCY ONLY, a corresponding base currency field exists but is only used for external G/L interfacing. This field is sign flipped for debit memos. The calculated Invoice Amount (DocInvoiceAmt) must match this amount before the invoice can be posted.

member.name: P:Erp.Tablesets.APInvHedRow.InvoiceBal
member.summary: Current outstanding balance. Carries a true sign. (Credit memos are negative).

member.name: P:Erp.Tablesets.APInvHedRow.DocInvoiceBal
member.summary: Current outstanding balance.(Vendors currency) Carries a true sign. (Credit memos are negative).

member.name: P:Erp.Tablesets.APInvHedRow.UnpostedBal
member.summary: Current outstanding balance which includes the unposted cash receipt amounts. This balance is updated immediately as cash is applied to the invoice, while the InvoiceBal field is not updated until the cash is posted. Used by cash receipts to validate online that an invoice is not over paid. Carries a true sign. (Credit memos are negative).

member.name: P:Erp.Tablesets.APInvHedRow.DocUnpostedBal
member.summary: Current outstanding balance which includes the unposted cash receipt amounts(Vendors currency). This balance is updated immediately as cash is applied to the invoice, while the InvoiceBal field is not updated until the cash is posted. Used by cash receipts to validate online that an invoice is not over paid. Carries a true sign. (Credit memos are negative).

member.name: P:Erp.Tablesets.APInvHedRow.InvoiceHeld
member.summary: Invoices that are within a data entry group can be put on "Hold". They will not be posted until InvoiceHeld=No. This flag can be used for whatever the reason the user may wish to keep an invoice in a data entry group from being posted. This is NOT the same thing as putting an invoice on PaymentHold.

member.name: P:Erp.Tablesets.APInvHedRow.PayHold
member.summary: Indicates if this invoice should be held from having any further payments made against it. If "yes" then invoice can't be selected in check processing.

member.name: P:Erp.Tablesets.APInvHedRow.Description
member.summary: A short description that can be used to explain what this invoice is for. Ex: Rent, Auto Lease Payment. This description is defaulted into the APTran.Description field when payments are made against the invoice.

member.name: P:Erp.Tablesets.APInvHedRow.CurrencyCode
member.summary: A unique code that identifies the currency.

member.name: P:Erp.Tablesets.APInvHedRow.ExchangeRate
member.summary: Exchange rate that will be used for this invoice. Defaults from CurrRate.CurrentRate. Conversion rates will be calculated as System Base = Foreign value * rate, Foreign value = system base * (1/rate). This is the dollar in foreign currency from the exchange rate tables in the newspapers.

member.name: P:Erp.Tablesets.APInvHedRow.LockRate
member.summary: Used with the currency module. When TRUE the currency rate can be changed by the user and cannot be changed by the system. This will also be the default for the invoice.

member.name: P:Erp.Tablesets.APInvHedRow.REFPONum
member.summary: Reference PO number(optional when CM is present). Used to identify the PO that this Invoice is for. If the Reference PO has a lock exchange rate then that is the rate that will be used on this AP invoice,

member.name: P:Erp.Tablesets.APInvHedRow.TaxRegionCode
member.summary: The Tax Region for this invoice.

member.name: P:Erp.Tablesets.APInvHedRow.JournalNum
member.summary: Journal number that invoice was posted to. This can also be thought of as the Voucher Number. Note: applicable only when posted to G/L.

member.name: P:Erp.Tablesets.APInvHedRow.JournalCode
member.summary: Journal that invoice was posted to.

member.name: P:Erp.Tablesets.APInvHedRow.UpdateTax

member.name: P:Erp.Tablesets.APInvHedRow.InvoiceVendorAmt
member.summary: For use by external G/L interfacing. This field is sign flipped for debit memos.

member.name: P:Erp.Tablesets.APInvHedRow.LegalNumber
member.summary: The Legal Number for the record. This number is created based on setup parameters in table LegalNumber.

member.name: P:Erp.Tablesets.APInvHedRow.ExternalID
member.summary: External Identification of the Invoice.

member.name: P:Erp.Tablesets.APInvHedRow.FixedAmt

member.name: P:Erp.Tablesets.APInvHedRow.XRefInvoiceNum

member.name: P:Erp.Tablesets.APInvHedRow.GlbCompany

member.name: P:Erp.Tablesets.APInvHedRow.DepGainLoss

member.name: P:Erp.Tablesets.APInvHedRow.CPayLinked

member.name: P:Erp.Tablesets.APInvHedRow.Rounding
member.summary: Rounding is occurred if multiplier or rule for Total amount is different with multiplier or rule for Total line amount, it is included in the 'Amount to Pay' and it is booked to the rounding account specified in the company setup when the invoice is posted

member.name: P:Erp.Tablesets.APInvHedRow.GLControlType
member.summary: The GL Control Type this invoice is assigned to. This combined with GLControlCode links the invoice to a specific GLControl record which supplies the G/L account of the appropriate payables. Defaults to value 'APAcct'.

member.name: P:Erp.Tablesets.APInvHedRow.DocRounding
member.summary: Rounding is occurred if multiplier or rule for Total amount is different with multiplier or rule for Total line amount, it is included in the 'Amount to Pay' and it is booked to the rounding account specified in the company setup when the invoice is posted

member.name: P:Erp.Tablesets.APInvHedRow.GLControlCode
member.summary: The GL Control Code this invoice is assigned to. This combined with GLControlType links the invoice to a specific GLControl record which supplies the G/L account of the appropriate payables. Defaults to EntityGLC type of 'APAcct' assigned to the supplier.

member.name: P:Erp.Tablesets.APInvHedRow.AllowOverrideLI
member.summary: Identifies whether or not the amounts on a logged invoice can be overridden during AP Invoice Entry. If set to false, the AP Invoice and Tax values must match the values on the Logged Invoice. If set to true, the logged invoice is voided.

member.name: P:Erp.Tablesets.APInvHedRow.MatchedFromLI
member.summary: Identifies if an invoice was matched from a logged invoice. If yes, the invoice was matched. If no, the invoice was not matched.

member.summary: The date this invoice will get applied to the books when it is posted.

member.name: P:Erp.Tablesets.APInvHedRow.ReadyToCalc
member.summary: This flag will be used to indicate if the invoice is ready for calculations. When set to true, tax calculations will take place whenever a save takes place for any tables tied to the invoice which could affect taxes (InvcDtl, InvcHead, InvcMisc, etc). It defaults from ARSyst.InvcReadyToCalcDflt field when an invoice is created.

member.name: P:Erp.Tablesets.APInvHedRow.RecalcBeforePost
member.summary: used to force the recalc of an invoice before posting due to changes in tax connect data that could not be resolved at the time the change was made to the Vantage data.

member.name: P:Erp.Tablesets.APInvHedRow.GetDfltTaxIds
member.summary: If set to true, the tax calculation logic will retrieve the default SalesTax ids for the line before calculating taxes. It will also be reset to true if the TaxConnectCalc flag switches from true to false.

member.summary: Major component of the foreign key of the related master record. For example: For a "PORel" control this field would contain the related PO Number.

member.name: P:Erp.Tablesets.APIHAPInvExpTGLCRow.Key2
member.summary: 2nd component of the foreign key to the related master record. For example: For a "PORel" control this field would contain the related PO Line Number. The usage of this field is dependent on the type of record.

member.name: P:Erp.Tablesets.APIHAPInvExpTGLCRow.Key3
member.summary: 3rd component of the foreign key to the related master record. For example: For a "PORel" control this field would contain the related PO Release Number. The usage of this field is dependent record type.

member.summary: Internal Supplier Number.

member.summary: AP Invoice Number.

member.name: P:Erp.Tablesets.APIHAPLnTaxRow.TaxCode
member.summary: Descriptive code assigned by user which uniquely identifies a Sales Tax master record. Can't be blank. This is used as a foreign key in other files and may be used in displays/reports where space for the full description is limited.

member.name: P:Erp.Tablesets.APIHAPLnTaxRow.TaxableAmt
member.summary: Taxable amount for this invoice. Manually entered if APInvTax.Manual = Yes else set equal to SysCalcTaxableAmt.

member.name: P:Erp.Tablesets.APIHAPLnTaxRow.DocTaxableAmt
member.summary: Taxable amount for this invoice in foreign currency. Manually entered if APInvTax.Manual = Yes else it is set equal to SysCalcDocTaxableAmt.

member.name: P:Erp.Tablesets.APIHAPLnTaxRow.Percent
member.summary: The tax percentage rate that is used for this invoice. This is defaulted from the SalesTax.Percent.

member.name: P:Erp.Tablesets.APIHAPLnTaxRow.TaxAmt
member.summary: Sales Tax amount for the corresponding taxable sales amount. Manually entered if APInvTax.Manual = Yes.

member.name: P:Erp.Tablesets.APIHAPLnTaxRow.DocTaxAmt
member.summary: Sales Tax amount for the corresponding taxable sales amount in foreign currency.

member.name: P:Erp.Tablesets.APIHAPLnTaxRow.ReportableAmt
member.summary: The reportable sales amount to the tax jurisdiction. Set the value as follows; first determine if the item needs to be reported to the tax jurisdiction. This is done by using the APInvDtl.TaxCode and APInvDtl/APInvMisc.TaxCat to find a record in the SalesTxC. If a record is not found or SalesTxC.Reportable = Yes then add in the line item extended amount or if this is for a InvcMisc record InvcMisc.Amount. Manually entered if APInvTax.Manual = Yes else set equal to SysCalcReportableAmt.

member.name: P:Erp.Tablesets.APIHAPLnTaxRow.DocReportableAmt
member.summary: The reportable sales amount to the tax jurisdiction expressed in the Vendor's currency. Manually entered if APInvTax.Manual = Yes else set equal to SysCalcDocTaxableAmt.

member.name: P:Erp.Tablesets.APIHAPLnTaxRow.Manual
member.summary: Indicates if the tax calculations are to be performed manually. When this field is set the Reportable, Taxable, and TaxAmount fields are enabled. When it is NOT set these fields are DISABLED and the system will perform all of the Reportable, Taxable, and TaxAmount calculations. Defaults from the SalesTax.Manual field.

member.name: P:Erp.Tablesets.APIHAPLnTaxRow.SysCalcTaxableAmt
member.summary: System calculated Taxable amount for this invoice.

member.name: P:Erp.Tablesets.APIHAPLnTaxRow.SysCalcDocTaxableAmt
member.summary: System calculated Taxable amount for this invoice in foreign currency.

member.name: P:Erp.Tablesets.APIHAPLnTaxRow.SysCalcReportableAmt
member.summary: System calculated reportable sales amount to the tax jurisdiction. Set the value as follows; first determine if the item needs to be reported to the tax jurisdiction. This is done by using the APInvDtl.TaxCode and APInvDtl/APInvMisc.TaxCat to find a record in the SalesTxC. If a record is not found or SalesTxC.Reportable = Yes then add in the line item extended amount or if this is for a InvcMisc record InvcMisc.Amount.

member.name: P:Erp.Tablesets.APIHAPLnTaxRow.SysCalcDocReportableAmt
member.summary: System calculated reportable sales amount to the tax jurisdiction expressed in the Vendor's currency.

member.name: P:Erp.Tablesets.APIHAPLnTaxRow.ECAcquisitionSeq
member.summary: Used to allow a second tax record using the same tax code on an invoice. When the sales tax field EcAquisition is checked then 2 invoice tax records are created. NOTE: This field is now used in VAT Reverse Charge logic. If an invoice line is marked for Reverse Charge, a second line is created just like in the ECAcquisition logic. To distinguish the two scenarios, the ReverseCharge flag will be set to true if the second line is for Reverse Charge.

member.summary: VendorNum duplicated from the corresponding APInvHed record. Not directly maintainable by the operator.

member.name: P:Erp.Tablesets.APInvDtlRow.InvoiceNum
member.summary: Invoice Number from corresponding APInvHed record.

member.name: P:Erp.Tablesets.APInvDtlRow.InvoiceLine
member.summary: This field along with Company, VendorNum and InvoiceNum make up the unique key to the table. The system generates this number during entry of new detail records. The system determines next available number by finding the APInvDtl record for the Invoice and the adding 1 to it.

member.name: P:Erp.Tablesets.APInvDtlRow.LineType
member.summary: Indicates the type of invoice line. "R" = Invoiced for Receipt of goods, "A" - Advance Billing, "M" - Misc. Billing, "U" - Unreceived goods, "J" - Job Miscellaneous charge A/P invoice, "S" - Asset Invoice Line. Not directly entered, set by invoice entry by the user selecting the appropriate menu option.

member.name: P:Erp.Tablesets.APInvDtlRow.UnitCost
member.summary: item's unit cost in the vendors unit of measure. Default can be obtained from the PODetail.UnitCost if related.

member.name: P:Erp.Tablesets.APInvDtlRow.DocUnitCost
member.summary: item's unit cost in the vendors unit of measure and currency. Default can be obtained from the PODetail.DocUnitCost if related.

member.name: P:Erp.Tablesets.APInvDtlRow.PartNum
member.summary: Part number used to identify line item part.

member.name: P:Erp.Tablesets.APInvDtlRow.PONum
member.summary: Purchase Order Number that this invoice line item is related to. If packing slip is referenced then it is set = to RcvDtl.PONum and can't be changed. If entered it must be a valid POHeader record. A reference is made to the purchase order using PONUM, POLine and PORelNum fields. If any one of these fields are entered then they all must be entered and be valid.

member.name: P:Erp.Tablesets.APInvDtlRow.POLine
member.summary: The PO line # that invoice is for. Defaulted from the RvcDtl if referenced to packing slip document.. Only applicable when PO is referenced.

member.name: P:Erp.Tablesets.APInvDtlRow.PORelNum
member.summary: Purchase Order Release # which is being invoiced. Defaulted from RcvDtl if related to a packing slip. If entered it Must be valid.

member.name: P:Erp.Tablesets.APInvDtlRow.Description
member.summary: Invoice line description.

member.name: P:Erp.Tablesets.APInvDtlRow.JobNum
member.summary: Job that this invoice is related to. Set to the RcvDtl.JobNum.

member.name: P:Erp.Tablesets.APInvDtlRow.AssemblySeq
member.summary: Job Assembly Sequence that this invoice line is related to. Set to RcvDtl.AssemblySeq.

member.name: P:Erp.Tablesets.APInvDtlRow.JobSeqType
member.summary: Indicates if this invoice line is related to a job material (jobmtl) or job subcontract (JobOper) record. Valid values are "M" = material or "S" = subcontract. This is set to RvcDtl.JobSeqType.

member.name: P:Erp.Tablesets.APInvDtlRow.JobSeq
member.summary: Seq # of specific material or subcontract operation record to which this line item is costed against. Defaults from the RcvDtl.JobSeq. Only applicable for a receipts to job.

member.name: P:Erp.Tablesets.APInvDtlRow.PurPoint
member.summary: The Vendor's purchase point ID. This is used as part of the foreign key to reference the RcvHead/RcvDtl records.

member.name: P:Erp.Tablesets.APInvDtlRow.PackSlip
member.summary: Vendor's packing slip that this A\P invoice detail line is associated with. This Along with PackLine provides a relationship to the receipt document detail (RcvDtl)

member.name: P:Erp.Tablesets.APInvDtlRow.PackLine
member.summary: The Pack Slip line of the RcvDtl record to which this A\P detail record is related to.

member.name: P:Erp.Tablesets.APInvDtlRow.VendorQty
member.summary: Total Invoiced Quantity for the line item. This is stored in the Vendors Unit of Measure. Can be defaulted from the packing slip detail if referenced (RcvDtl.POReceiptQty)

member.name: P:Erp.Tablesets.APInvDtlRow.PUM
member.summary: Unit of Measure code for the vendor's quantity. Defaulted in the following hierarchy: from the RcvDel.PUM if packing slip is referenced, from PODetail.PUM if PO is referenced, from Part.PUM if valid part or finally from XaSyst.DefaultUM.

member.name: P:Erp.Tablesets.APInvDtlRow.OurQty
member.summary: Invoiced Quantity for the line item in our unit of measure. This can be defaulted from the packing slip detail if referenced (RcvDtl.ReceiptQty)

member.name: P:Erp.Tablesets.APInvDtlRow.IUM
member.summary: Unit of Measure code for invoiced quantity in our unit of measure. Defaulted in the following hierarchy: from the RcvDel.IUM if packing slip is referenced, from PODetail.IUM if PO is referenced, from Part.IUM if valid part or finally from XaSyst.DefaultUM.

member.name: P:Erp.Tablesets.APInvDtlRow.CostPerCode
member.summary: Indicates the costing per quantity. It can be "E" = per each, "C" = per hundred, "M" = per thousand. Used to calculate the extended unit cost for the line item. The logic is to divide the APInvDtl.VendorQty by the appropriate "per" value and then multiply by unit cost. Use the PODetail.CostPerCode if related to a PO else use Part.PricePerCode if valid part. Else default as "E". Valid database values are "E" = Each, "C" = per 100 or "M" = per 1,000.

member.name: P:Erp.Tablesets.APInvDtlRow.VenPartNum
member.summary: Vendor's part number. Optional, defaults from the RcvDtl, PODetail or blank.

member.name: P:Erp.Tablesets.APInvDtlRow.ExtCost
member.summary: Extended Cost for the invoice line item. Calculated as the (VendorQty/CostPer) * UnitCost or can be directly maintained in which case it recalculates the UnitCost value.

member.name: P:Erp.Tablesets.APInvDtlRow.DocExtCost
member.summary: Extended Cost for the invoice line item in Vendors currency. Calculated as the (VendorQty/CostPer) * UnitCost or can be directly maintained in which case it recalculates the UnitCost value.

member.name: P:Erp.Tablesets.APInvDtlRow.TotalMiscChrg
member.summary: Non-Maintainable. Rolled up total of all misc. charge records for this invoice detail line.

member.name: P:Erp.Tablesets.APInvDtlRow.DocTotalMiscChrg
member.summary: Non-Maintainable. Rolled up total of all misc. charge records for this invoice detail line in vendors currency.

member.name: P:Erp.Tablesets.APInvDtlRow.LineComment
member.summary: Used to establish invoice comments about the invoice line.

member.name: P:Erp.Tablesets.APInvDtlRow.MatchDate
member.summary: Mirror image of related RCVHead.ReceiptDate. Only applies to LineType = U. Updated during the Invoice/Receipt match posting process if GLSyst.PostInvtyWipCos = No. This date is used as the journal date and to determine the fiscal period when the Invoice/Receipt process is responsible for generating the GL entries. (See CaMatchingDiv description)

member.name: P:Erp.Tablesets.APInvDtlRow.MatchFiscalYear
member.summary: Applies only to UnReceived Lines (LineType = U). Update via the Invoice/Receipt Match program when Inventory is NOT interfaced to G/L.

member.name: P:Erp.Tablesets.APInvDtlRow.MatchFiscalPeriod
member.summary: Applies only to UnReceived Lines (LineType = U). Update via the Invoice/Receipt Match program when Inventory is NOT interfaced to G/L.

member.name: P:Erp.Tablesets.APInvDtlRow.TaxExempt
member.summary: Indicates if this item is exempt from sales tax for this line item. If field is non-blank it is considered exempt. This code is totally user definable and no validation is required. This field is intended to be used for analysis purposes. When the value is changed from blank to non-blank or vice versa tax calculation logic kicks in to calculate the sales tax info.

member.name: P:Erp.Tablesets.APInvDtlRow.TaxCatID
member.summary: Indicates the Tax Category for this line item. Defaults from the Part Master.

member.name: P:Erp.Tablesets.APInvDtlRow.AdvancePayAmt
member.summary: The amount this line item that is reduced by due to prior advanced payments. It is defaulted from the PODetail.AdvancePayBal. This value reduces the PODetail.AdvancePayBal.

member.name: P:Erp.Tablesets.APInvDtlRow.DocAdvancePayAmt
member.summary: The amount this line item that is reduced by due to prior advanced payments. It is defaulted from the PODetail.AdvancePayBal. This value reduces the PODetail.AdvancePayBal.

member.name: P:Erp.Tablesets.APInvDtlRow.DocAssetInvoiceBal
member.summary: This is the current invoice line balance (in vendor currency) left to be consumed in the asset addition process. An asset invoice line can be linked to one or more assets and each asset addition linking to this invoice line will reduce the balance of this DocAssetInvoiceBal. When this field reaches zero then this invoice line cannot be linked in the asset addition anymore.

member.name: P:Erp.Tablesets.APInvDtlRow.AssetBalOurQty
member.summary: This is the Invoiced Quantity balance left to be consumed in the asset addition process. An asset invoice line can be linked to one or more assets and each asset addition linking to this invoice line will reduce the balance qty of this AssetBalOurQty. When this field reaches zero then this invoice line cannot be linked in the asset addition anymore. This qty is expressed in our unit of measure.

member.name: P:Erp.Tablesets.APLnTaxRow.TaxableAmt
member.summary: Taxable amount for this invoice. Manually entered if APInvTax.Manual = Yes else set equal to SysCalcTaxableAmt.

member.name: P:Erp.Tablesets.APLnTaxRow.DocTaxableAmt
member.summary: Taxable amount for this invoice in foreign currency. Manually entered if APInvTax.Manual = Yes else it is set equal to SysCalcDocTaxableAmt.

member.name: P:Erp.Tablesets.APLnTaxRow.Percent
member.summary: The tax percentage rate that is used for this invoice. This is defaulted from the SalesTax.Percent.

member.name: P:Erp.Tablesets.APLnTaxRow.TaxAmt
member.summary: Sales Tax amount for the corresponding taxable sales amount. Manually entered if APInvTax.Manual = Yes.

member.name: P:Erp.Tablesets.APLnTaxRow.DocTaxAmt
member.summary: Sales Tax amount for the corresponding taxable sales amount in foreign currency.

member.name: P:Erp.Tablesets.APLnTaxRow.ReportableAmt
member.summary: The reportable sales amount to the tax jurisdiction. Set the value as follows; first determine if the item needs to be reported to the tax jurisdiction. This is done by using the APInvDtl.TaxCode and APInvDtl/APInvMisc.TaxCat to find a record in the SalesTxC. If a record is not found or SalesTxC.Reportable = Yes then add in the line item extended amount or if this is for a InvcMisc record InvcMisc.Amount. Manually entered if APInvTax.Manual = Yes else set equal to SysCalcReportableAmt.

member.name: P:Erp.Tablesets.APLnTaxRow.DocReportableAmt
member.summary: The reportable sales amount to the tax jurisdiction expressed in the Vendor's currency. Manually entered if APInvTax.Manual = Yes else set equal to SysCalcDocTaxableAmt.

member.name: P:Erp.Tablesets.APLnTaxRow.Manual
member.summary: Indicates if the tax calculations are to be performed manually. When this field is set the Reportable, Taxable, and TaxAmount fields are enabled. When it is NOT set these fields are DISABLED and the system will perform all of the Reportable, Taxable, and TaxAmount calculations. Defaults from the SalesTax.Manual field.

member.name: P:Erp.Tablesets.APLnTaxRow.SysCalcReportableAmt
member.summary: System calculated reportable sales amount to the tax jurisdiction. Set the value as follows; first determine if the item needs to be reported to the tax jurisdiction. This is done by using the APInvDtl.TaxCode and APInvDtl/APInvMisc.TaxCat to find a record in the SalesTxC. If a record is not found or SalesTxC.Reportable = Yes then add in the line item extended amount or if this is for a InvcMisc record InvcMisc.Amount.

member.name: P:Erp.Tablesets.APLnTaxRow.SysCalcDocReportableAmt
member.summary: System calculated reportable sales amount to the tax jurisdiction expressed in the Vendor's currency.

member.name: P:Erp.Tablesets.APLnTaxRow.ECAcquisitionSeq
member.summary: Used to allow a second tax record using the same tax code on an invoice. When the sales tax field EcAquisition is checked then 2 invoice tax records are created. NOTE: This field is now used in VAT Reverse Charge logic. If an invoice line is marked for Reverse Charge, a second line is created just like in the ECAcquisition logic. To distinguish the two scenarios, the ReverseCharge flag will be set to true if the second line is for Reverse Charge.

member.summary: Major component of the foreign key of the related master record. For example: For a "PORel" control this field would contain the related PO Number.

member.name: P:Erp.Tablesets.APInvDtlTGLCRow.Key2
member.summary: 2nd component of the foreign key to the related master record. For example: For a "PORel" control this field would contain the related PO Line Number. The usage of this field is dependent on the type of record.

member.name: P:Erp.Tablesets.APInvDtlTGLCRow.Key3

member.name: P:Erp.Tablesets.APInvDtlTGLCRow.Statistical
member.summary: Identifies if statistical information may be entered for the natural (chart) account. Accounts can be used only for monetary amounts, both monetary and statistical amounts or only for statistical amounts. 0 = Only used for monetary amounts. 1 = Used for both monetary and statistical amounts. 2 = Only used for statistical amounts.

member.summary: AP Invoice Number.

member.name: P:Erp.Tablesets.APInvTaxRow.TaxCode
member.summary: Descriptive code assigned by user which uniquely identifies a Sales Tax master record. Can't be blank. This is used as a foreign key in other files and may be used in displays/reports where space for the full description is limited.

member.name: P:Erp.Tablesets.APInvTaxRow.TaxableAmt
member.summary: Taxable amount for this invoice. Manually entered if APInvTax.Manual = Yes else set equal to SysCalcTaxableAmt.

member.name: P:Erp.Tablesets.APInvTaxRow.DocTaxableAmt
member.summary: Taxable amount for this invoice in foreign currency. Manually entered if APInvTax.Manual = Yes else it is set equal to SysCalcDocTaxableAmt.

member.name: P:Erp.Tablesets.APInvTaxRow.Percent
member.summary: The tax percentage rate that is used for this invoice. This is defaulted from the SalesTax.Percent.

member.name: P:Erp.Tablesets.APInvTaxRow.TaxAmt
member.summary: Sales Tax amount for the corresponding taxable sales amount. Manually entered if APInvTax.Manual = Yes.

member.name: P:Erp.Tablesets.APInvTaxRow.DocTaxAmt
member.summary: Sales Tax amount for the corresponding taxable sales amount in foreign currency.

member.name: P:Erp.Tablesets.APInvTaxRow.ReportableAmt
member.summary: The reportable sales amount to the tax jurisdiction. Set the value as follows; first determine if the item needs to be reported to the tax jurisdiction. This is done by using the APInvDtl.TaxCode and APInvDtl/APInvMisc.TaxCat to find a record in the SalesTxC. If a record is not found or SalesTxC.Reportable = Yes then add in the line item extended amount or if this is for a InvcMisc record InvcMisc.Amount. Manually entered if APInvTax.Manual = Yes else set equal to SysCalcReportableAmt.

member.name: P:Erp.Tablesets.APInvTaxRow.DocReportableAmt
member.summary: The reportable sales amount to the tax jurisdiction expressed in the Vendor's currency. Manually entered if APInvTax.Manual = Yes else set equal to SysCalcDocTaxableAmt.

member.name: P:Erp.Tablesets.APInvTaxRow.Manual
member.summary: Indicates if the tax calculations are to be performed manually. When this field is set the Reportable, Taxable, and TaxAmount fields are enabled. When it is NOT set these fields are DISABLED and the system will perform all of the Reportable, Taxable, and TaxAmount calculations. Defaults from the SalesTax.Manual field.

member.name: P:Erp.Tablesets.APInvTaxRow.SysCalcTaxableAmt
member.summary: System calculated Taxable amount for this invoice.

member.name: P:Erp.Tablesets.APInvTaxRow.SysCalcDocTaxableAmt
member.summary: System calculated Taxable amount for this invoice in foreign currency.

member.name: P:Erp.Tablesets.APInvTaxRow.SysCalcReportableAmt
member.summary: System calculated reportable sales amount to the tax jurisdiction. Set the value as follows; first determine if the item needs to be reported to the tax jurisdiction. This is done by using the APInvDtl.TaxCode and APInvDtl/APInvMisc.TaxCat to find a record in the SalesTxC. If a record is not found or SalesTxC.Reportable = Yes then add in the line item extended amount or if this is for a InvcMisc record InvcMisc.Amount.

member.name: P:Erp.Tablesets.APInvTaxRow.SysCalcDocReportableAmt
member.summary: System calculated reportable sales amount to the tax jurisdiction expressed in the Vendor's currency.

member.name: P:Erp.Tablesets.APInvTaxRow.ECAcquisitionSeq
member.summary: Used to allow a second tax record using the same tax code on an invoice. When the sales tax field EcAquisition is checked then 2 invoice tax records are created. NOTE: This field is now used in VAT Reverse Charge logic. If an invoice line is marked for Reverse Charge, a second line is created just like in the ECAcquisition logic. To distinguish the two scenarios, the ReverseCharge flag will be set to true if the second line is for Reverse Charge.

member.summary: Company Identifier.

member.summary: Purchase order number that this miscellaneous record is related to.

member.name: P:Erp.Tablesets.APInvPOMiscRow.POLine
member.summary: PO line number that this miscellaneous record is related to. If related to the PO Header then this field is zero. This number is not directly entered by the user; rather it is carried through from the header or detail line that user was on when they requested miscellaneous maintenance.

member.name: P:Erp.Tablesets.APInvPOMiscRow.SeqNum
member.summary: Sequence Number

member.name: P:Erp.Tablesets.APInvPOMiscRow.MiscCode
member.summary: The Miscellaneous Charge Code. This must be valid in the PurMisc master file.

member.name: P:Erp.Tablesets.APInvPOMiscRow.Description
member.summary: Description of the miscellaneous charge. This will be printed on the PO. The default is provided by PurMisc.Description, but it is overridable by the user. This can't be blank.

member.name: P:Erp.Tablesets.APInvPOMiscRow.MiscAmt
member.summary: The amount of the Miscellaneous Charge/Credit. Can't be zero.

member.name: P:Erp.Tablesets.APInvPOMiscRow.DocMiscAmt
member.summary: The Customer Currency amount of the Miscellaneous Charge/Credit. Can't be zero.

member.name: P:Erp.Tablesets.APInvPOMiscRow.Percentage
member.summary: This field will be used to define the percentage of the extended amount that will be applied as the 'Miscellaneous charge'.

member.name: P:Erp.Tablesets.APInvPOMiscRow.Type
member.summary: This field will define if the miscellaneous charge is calculated as a flat amount or if is calculated as a percentage of the extended price.

member.name: P:Erp.Tablesets.APInvPOMiscRow.SysRowID
member.summary: Unique identifier for this row. The value is a GUID.

member.summary: Company Identifier.

member.name: P:Erp.Tablesets.APUninvoicedRcptLinesRow.VendorNum
member.summary: The internal key that is used to tie back to the Vendor master file.

member.name: P:Erp.Tablesets.APUninvoicedRcptLinesRow.PurPoint
member.summary: The Vendors purchase point ID.

member.name: P:Erp.Tablesets.APUninvoicedRcptLinesRow.PackSlip
member.summary: Vendors Packing Slip #.

member.name: P:Erp.Tablesets.APUninvoicedRcptLinesRow.PackLine
member.summary: An integer that uniquely identifies a detail record within a Packing slip. This is assigned by the system by finding the last RcvDtl record for the vendor's packing slip and add 1.

member.name: P:Erp.Tablesets.APUninvoicedRcptLinesRow.InvoiceNum
member.summary: Invoice Number on which this receipt detail was invoiced. This is updated from the A\P invoice entry process.

member.name: P:Erp.Tablesets.APUninvoicedRcptLinesRow.PartNum
member.summary: Our Part Number of the item that has been received. Captured from the related PODetail.PartNum for receipts of PO item. Entered by the user for miscellaneous receipts in which case it can't be blank. It must be valid in the Part file for receipt to stock.

member.name: P:Erp.Tablesets.APUninvoicedRcptLinesRow.OurQty
member.summary: Receipt quantity in our unit of measure.

member.name: P:Erp.Tablesets.APUninvoicedRcptLinesRow.OurUnitCost
member.summary: Unit cost base on our unit of measure. Defaults from PODetail.IUM for purchase order receipt.

member.name: P:Erp.Tablesets.APUninvoicedRcptLinesRow.PONum
member.summary: Purchase Order # that the receipt is for. Only applicable for receipt of Purchase Order transactions.

member.name: P:Erp.Tablesets.APUninvoicedRcptLinesRow.POLine
member.summary: The PO line # which is being received. Only applicable for PO receipt transactions.

member.name: P:Erp.Tablesets.APUninvoicedRcptLinesRow.PORelNum
member.summary: Purchase Order Release # which is being received.

member.name: P:Erp.Tablesets.APUninvoicedRcptLinesRow.TranReference
member.summary: A generic fill-in field that could be used to allow the user to enter data such as Heat, Lot #'s.

member.name: P:Erp.Tablesets.APUninvoicedRcptLinesRow.PartDescription
member.summary: Describes the Part associated with this transaction. This is not directly entered by the user. Instead the entry programs pull it in from a parent record. The parent record could be the Part, JobOper, PODetl, JobMtl...

member.name: P:Erp.Tablesets.APUninvoicedRcptLinesRow.VendorQty
member.summary: Quantity received against a purchase order in the vendors unit of measure.

member.name: P:Erp.Tablesets.APUninvoicedRcptLinesRow.VendorUnitCost
member.summary: Purchase Order Receipt actual unit cost in the vendors unit of measure. RIO- With the currency module it is calculated based on the current exchange rate. This is defaulted from the POdetail record. PO receipts uses this along with the calculated purchasing conversion factor to determine the OurlUnitCost field which is used as cost to job or stock.

member.name: P:Erp.Tablesets.APUninvoicedRcptLinesRow.PUM
member.summary: Vendor's selling Unit of Measure.

member.name: P:Erp.Tablesets.APUninvoicedRcptLinesRow.DUM
member.summary: Dimension unit of measure. Cannot be blank. Defaults to part's unit of measure.

member.name: P:Erp.Tablesets.APUninvoicedRcptLinesRow.PassedQty
member.summary: Total quantity that passed inspection to date. In receiving unit of measure. This is a summary maintained by the DMR process.

member.name: P:Erp.Tablesets.APUninvoicedRcptLinesRow.FailedQty
member.summary: Total to date quantity that has failed inspection. This is a summary maintained by the DMR process.

member.summary: Unique identifier for this row. The value is a GUID.
